body:
You can pass in onClick event and trigger stopPropagation()

<div onClick={(e)=>this.props.anAction(innerInnerElementName, e)}>    
   {innerInnerElementName}
</div>

anAction(el, ev) {
  ev.stopPropagation();
  ...
}
title: How can I stop event bubbling for nested components dispatching a redux action?
